snippet.title: 4 homemade Halloween costume ideas from a cardboard box
snippet.description:
* Washing Machine Dial In: Fold a piece of cardboard that's as wide as the box into a three-sided triangle. Tape it closed and tape the base of the triangle to the box. Add a strip of duct tape (for the control panel), then glue on plastic bottle caps.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/10/30/living/real-simple-homemade-costume/index.html

snippet.title: London: Where to be seen
snippet.description:
* Pubs and bars are the social glue that keep the city's population from fragmenting into anonymity. Recent years have seen the traditional London pubs joined by fancy Euro bars and New-York style cocktail lounges.
http://www.cnn.com/2008/TRAVEL/09/02/london.seen/index.html

snippet.title: TIME Asia 012599
snippet.description:
* The pride of independent India is its democracy freewheeling, pluralistic and broadbased. In the 1988 general elections, more than 375 million Indians voted. Free and regular elections, its argued, provide the glue that has held the heterogeneous land together for half a century.
http://www.cnn.com/ASIANOW/time/asia/magazine/1999/990726/990125/india_christians1.html

snippet.title: Easy DIY Halloween costumes
snippet.description:
* No-hassle Halloween costumes that you can throw together last minute:
http://www.cnn.com/2011/10/06/living/halloween-diy-rs/index.html

snippet.title: Decorating with fall colors
snippet.description:
* The shades of autumn such as orange, yellow, dark green, rust and brown make lovely accents for the home. Muted fabrics and finishes are the perfect canvas for highlighting these bold colors.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/11/11/living/martha-decorating-fall-colors/index.html

snippet.title: Give your cubicle a serious makeover
snippet.description:
* With their tweed-like fabric walls, dull laminate desktops and harsh fluorescent lighting, it's hard to make a cube look anything but drab. It doesn't help that decorations are usually limited to colored file organizers, a calendar and a couple of photographs.
http://www.cnn.com/2006/US/Careers/07/14/career.cubicle/index.html

snippet.title: Chanel chic simmers for spring
snippet.description:
* PARIS CNN Coco Chanels timeless style comes alive in a classic spring and summer collection, updated to reflect todays technology and fabrics.
http://www.cnn.com/STYLE/9710/21/chanel/index.html
